Title: Bring the Thunder
Description:
The nerubians will strike out in anger and pride--which is exactly what we want.

They will swarm the meadery soon, seeking to punish us for attacking their burrow. We will hold them here on the ground while you take to the skies. When Zirix appears to command his army, we will light the fuses.

Wenbrandt scrounged together some supplies we can use to corral the nerubians. Set them up quickly, and then we will get you on a stormrook. Go!
ObjectivesText: Hold off the nerubians at the Cinderbrew Meadery until Queensguard Zirix appears.
PortraitGiverText: If Zirix is slain here, the Coreway should be safe from a second attack.
RewardText:
Zirix is dead. We did it. It is over. Baelgrim did it.

<She repeats the last phrase to herself over and over more quietly each time as if unable to process the event.>

Objectives.Text: Speak to Baelgrim to begin the defense
